Material: The material that the sprite is rendered with.
DistanceToOpacityCurve: A curve that maps distance on the X axis to the sprite opacity on the Y axis.
BaseSizeX: The base width of the sprite, multiplied with the DistanceToSizeCurve.
BaseSizeY: The base height of the sprite, multiplied with the DistanceToSizeCurve.
DistanceToSizeCurve: A curve that maps distance on the X axis to the sprite size on the Y axis.
bSizeIsInScreenSpace: Whether the size is defined in screen-space or world-space.
